channel.title: Need help! looking for a old server!
channel.description:
Hello everyone. I am looking for a old server I use to play. I'll explain it in detail and hopefully someone can recognize it for me.
The server client had this picture as the background.[img]http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110223024829/runescape/images/7/70/Barrows_Brothers_1920x1200.jpg[/img].
Also, the entire client had 1 song playing through out the entire time you had it opened and it would keep repeating. The song was Escape The fate - The Ransom. Here is a link to the song.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PRVbf1um9LM
If this rings a bell to anyone can you please post what the server name was?
-Kidharris
